column4: Good evening everyone! Could somebody give me little help with WLAN usb-device? Little brothers Zonet zew2502 usb can be found on "device manager", but I cannot locate it with "iwconfig". howcome?
USB WLAN devices are the bane of users everywere. I recomend a PCI card.
ah thank you. They just bought the cheapest one they could find, I cant blame them :) Need to wait over easter to get PCI card :(
Glad I was able to help.
